summary:
I'm a driven Finance professional with over five years of experience in various Accounting and Finance roles in internal environments and Post-Bachelor in Finance (QC). During my bachelor degree I've gotten my feet wet with leading a small team and enjoyed working with people on common goals and personal development.

Within Philips Intellectual Property & Standards I fulfill two roles: One of business partner for Global Brand Licensing, a strong and healthy growing business within Philips, and the other as Financial Office of the License Administration Department.

A business partner supports the business with information, communication and relevant insight in the progress on budgets and forecast. I will be making the AOP and Rolling Forecasts and delivering ad hoc support wherever required by the business. 

My second role gives me the opportunity to stay “close to home”, working within a fully occupied administration that delivers results at a high standard. This is shown in excellent (internal / ICS SOx) Audit performance and the trust of the business in getting the right information in the right way and on time. In my role I focus on the payable side of things, with a responsibility in a set number of accounts (Balance and P&L) and a diverse working experience in intangibles, accruals and provisions.

profile_positions.description:
As a business partner within IP&S I'm responsible for making and keeping track of the Annual OP through forecasting and continuous review of our progress.
I'm also the liaison between the business and the License Administration Department in making the right translation between the business needs, the administrative abilities and accounting policies (IFRS and Philips Accounting Principals) with a focus in the field of licensing.
profile_positions.title: Finance Business Partner - IP&S

profile_positions.description:
As a Finance Officer with Intellectual Property & Standards (IP&S) I am responsible on running the daily activities within the License Administration Department (LAD) as well as for the IP&S organization which includes:
Leading and developing a team of two employees, managing the licensing-out part of the administration which includes: Registration of master data (contracts), collecting, verifying and processing data regarding IP usage and running day-to-day operation such as invoicing and business support. I have a special field of interest in all things concerning Withholding Taxes.
In my role I had the responsibility for my own set of balance sheet and P&L accounts, ensuring correctness during the Month End process and during Audits (ICS Sox and IFRS). 

Starting September 2016 my field of interest switched from licensing-out to licensing-in however maintaining a group of two persons for whom I have a responsibility. My responbilities shifted from a receiving end to a supplier of information to IP&S licensors on the usage of IP by Philips. Other responsibilities such as an own set of Balance and P&L accounts remained, as well as a role in the Month End closing process.

Through out my team within LAD I'm working within the team on system and procedural improvements, supporting the business on Ad hoc bases and executing and coordinating Audits and ICS-Sox.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Finance Officer

profile_positions.description:
Senior Accountant at HERE, Maps for Life.
In my daily activities I work in a team of two and responsible of calculating and reporting to our key partners in automotive, consumer and enterprise businesses across the globe and our different entities. This differs from royalties for traffic information to compensation through Sales Commissions for the biggest car brands in the world. In doing so I am not only involved in the front-end (reporting) but also heavily involved in our statutory obligation when it comes to external Audits and Sarbanes-Oxley compliance. In addition I calculate and report our VAT spanning different European countries and provide support to Management and our revenue team when needed.
My monthly operations / portfolio consists of:
- Calculating / reporting / contract management of 40+ Vendors, as well as maintaining Balance Sheets and P&L accounts.
- Responsible for / assisting with Tax Returns in 7 different countries and managing the Withholding Taxes for HERE Europe B.V.
- Shared responsibility of managing contracts and commitments with partners (+500) all over the world in expanding HERE's database, quality and products.
- Maintaining all activities with the SOX-standards as well as testing other departments on correctness and completeness to SOX regulations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Accountant

profile_positions.description:
As team member of the service and support team of Contract Management Services within the Accounting organization, my primary focus is managing and administrating NAVTEQ's license customers. 
The purpose of this position is to be the main contact for external customers and the associated Account Managers for these customers.
profile_positions.title: Contract Management Services Specialist

profile_positions.description:
As a banking professional I work within the Rabobank as a member of their flex-team for the Service Centrum Financieren; "Afhandel en Beheer". The goal is to support different teams in their daily operations whenever there is a need of extra capacity on a direct, ad hoc bases. 

Key areas of expertise were mortgages, personal banking and general administrative work.
profile_positions.title: Bancaire medewerker Service Centrum Financieren

profile_positions.description:
As a back-up team leader I have the responsibility in taking care of the planning and oversight of ten to fifteen young students. As a team leader I’m doing appraisals, work review and communicating directly with the customers of our team. The customers are the teams working at Rabobank who are providing services to both local banks and private bankers.

During my time I was able to keep my team intact by providing quality support and results, this resulted in getting more, difficult assignments and becoming a respected partner within the “day teams”.
profile_positions.title: Backup Teamleider, Service Centrum Financieren - Betalingen

profile_positions.description: Working part-time next to my Bachelor’s degree I was a member of the "nightshift" team within the centralized administration of the Rabobank, one of the biggest bankers in the Netherlands. The main goal was to support the teams in daily operation in different fields; mortgages, personal banking and administrative duties of local banks.
profile_positions.title: Medewerker Service Centrum Financieren, Rabobank Nederland
